My Journey

Curiosity has driven my journey from the start. I grew up taking hardware and software apart just to see how they worked, which shaped me into a creative, systems-oriented problem solver with a relentless taste for experimentation.

One standout project felt like unlocking a new dimension: developing the hardware circuitry and software for a capacitive touch panel controller that interfaced seamlessly with a PIC18F18F microprocessor to drive a 4.3" Newhaven TFT display. I wrote every line of firmware from scratch to harness the FocalTech FT5X06 chip, enabling responsive multi-touch gestures like swipes and taps with instant on-screen feedback. Seeing fingers glide across the panel trigger real-time responses delivered pure exhilaration‚ÄîI could perceive the 0's and 1's I had programmed travel through the microcontroller and drive the hardware. It opened a portal to limitless possibilities.

That same thrill carried me into enterprise systems, where I built VB.NET applications to track RMAs at a manufacturing firm in Elgin, IL, opening the door to financial platforms and business processes. Since then, I've mastered how systems, workflows, and people intersect across complex organizations.

My focus has since expanded‚Äîbridging functional needs, technical architecture, and user experience with AI, machine learning, and intelligent automation. Today, I'm chasing that same video game rush: creating financial and operational systems that are efficient, intuitive, resilient, scalable, and genuinely inspiring to use.

Experience

Executive Summary:

Accomplished technology and business leader with a proven track record of driving digital transformation, operational excellence, and strategic growth across Fortune 500 enterprises. Expert in Oracle Cloud ERP and EPM financial systems, process reengineering, and large-scale program delivery. Adept at bridging business and technology, leading cross-functional teams, and building high-performance cultures. Recognized for innovative problem-solving, stakeholder engagement, and delivering measurable results in complex, regulated environments. Passionate about leveraging AI, automation, and data-driven insights to create resilient, future-ready organizations.

Blue Owl Capital

üìç New York City, NY

Full-time

Principal - Financial Applications (Jan 2024 - Present, 2 yrs 1 mo)

Vice President - Financial Applications Manager (Jul 2021 - Dec 2023, 2 yrs 6 mos)

Visionary financial technology leader with a proven record of transforming and scaling enterprise financial systems, teams, and processes to support hypergrowth in public companies. As Head of Financial Applications, led the evolution from a single ERP platform to a multi-application landscape with over a dozen systems and ~50 integrations. Built foundational structures for support, team management, and process governance‚Äîwhere none existed‚Äîdriving cross-functional alignment across onshore and offshore teams. Enabled company growth from $45B to $300B in AUM through innovation, compliance execution, and systems leadership aligned with strategic finance goals.

Notable Achievements:

  • Enterprise Application Expansion: Scaled the financial applications environment from a single ERP system to a portfolio of over a dozen platforms supporting finance, legal, and operations.
  • Integration Ecosystem Growth: Built ~50 business-critical integrations from the ground up, enabling seamless data flow across departments and systems.
  • Organizational Structure & Process Design: Established foundational structures for support ticketing, team operations, and KPI tracking across onshore and offshore teams where none previously existed.
  • IPO Readiness & SOX Compliance: Delivered audit-ready, SOX-compliant reporting within one year of IPO by designing secure, controlled, and transparent financial system processes.
  • EPM Implementation Leadership: Led successful deployments of Oracle EPM modules including EDM, FCCS, and ARCS, supporting financial close, reconciliation, and planning activities.
  • Team Building & Leadership: Scaled the financial applications function from a solo role to a team of 15 high-performing professionals, each with ownership of key platforms.
  • Change Management Governance: Created and now lead a structured change management process and weekly Change Advisory Board, reducing risk and improving audit posture.
  • SDLC & Release Management: Instituted a finance-specific SDLC model, improving delivery discipline, quality, and traceability.
  • Monday.com Enterprise Adoption: Spearheaded enterprise-wide rollout of Monday.com for project management, task tracking, and change control.
  • Vendor Management & Contracts: Serve as the primary point of contact for all financial application vendor relationships, overseeing agreements, renewals, and strategic alignment.
  • C-Suite & Executive Partnership: Trusted advisor to executive leadership, including the Chief Accounting Officer, providing roadmap updates, risk overviews, and performance transparency.

Contract

Oracle Financial Functional Consultant

Senior Oracle Financials Functional Analyst with experience across full life cycle implementations, upgrades, and post-production support of Oracle E-Business Suite (EBS) Financials (GL, AP, AR, FA, CE, PO, SLA, iExpense, iProcurement, Tax). Led a global team of 12, managed requirements definition, gap analysis, fit-gap analysis, system configuration, testing, user training, and support. Designed and implemented complex approval workflows using Oracle AME. Extensive experience with data migration, localization, and integration with HR and third-party systems. Facilitated business process reviews, user acceptance testing (UAT), Conference Room Pilot (CRP), and documentation for global rollouts across US, Canada, Europe, Asia, and the Philippines. Applied Oracle AIM methodology (RD20, BP80, BR30, BR100, MD50, CV40, TE40) and collaborated with all levels of business owners, users, and technical teams.

  • Designed and implemented approval workflows for purchase requisitions, AP invoices, supplier registration, and GL journals using Oracle AME; customized AME attributes, conditions, and rules
  • Managed requirements gathering, gap analysis, and documentation (BR30, MD50, BR100, RD20, BP80, CV40, TE40) for global rollouts
  • Created and maintained user manuals, held training sessions for large user groups, and led UAT and CRP testing phases
  • Implemented FA and GL localizations for India and Philippines, including tax and asset controls, block of assets, and fiscal year calendars
  • Developed SQL extracts, ad-hoc queries, and WebADI templates for data migration, mass upload, and reporting (using Toad/SQL Developer)
  • Acted as liaison between business and IT, coordinated with vendors and offshore teams for timely deliverables and aggressive timelines
  • Created budgets for various projects and aligned resources based on technical and functional needs
  • Delivered solution to successfully integrate HR data between Workday and Oracle
  • Conducted and evaluated process review and gap analysis to resolve requirements not addressed by Oracle apps, designing custom solutions within Oracle and with 3rd party applications
  • Interacted with Oracle support using Metalink and Oracle Web Conference (OWC) to resolve application issues and bugs; maintained follow-up with Oracle Service Request (SR)
  • Recognized for excellent verbal communication, presentation skills, and cross-functional collaboration
